page.shortlink: ux control properties on page window properties
page.description: The "On-Page Window Properties" section of the control properties appears in the properties list when you embed existing objects inside a UX component. To embed an existing object in a UX component, go to the 'Other Controls' section of the UX Controls page and click on [Embedded Object].

figure.title: Adding an [Embedded Object] will display the "On-Page Window Properties".
